quote: This was the start of a period that blurs as I try to recall it. Incidents seem to cascade and merge. Events become feelings, fellings become events. Head and heart are contrary historians.
quote_letters: THIS WAS THE START OF A PERIOD THAT BLURS AS I TRY TO RECALL IT INCIDENTS SEEM TO CASCADE AND MERGE EVENTS BECOME FEELINGS FELLINGS BECOME EVENTS HEAD AND HEART ARE CONTRARY HISTORIANS
